website_summaries.verdict: An affordable iron supplement that effectively increases iron levels.
pros: Each tablet contains 65 milligrams of iron
The tablets are small in size and easy to swallow
cons: The tablets dissolve quickly, leaving a bad taste if you don't swallow it quickly

customer_reviews.title: All ya anemics stand up...but not too fast
customer_reviews.text: I used to be an (undiagnosed) anemic. I was turned away numerous times from donating blood because “I had low iron”... I started taking these bad boys and homegirl is now donating plasma twice a week! My iron is up and I feel like I have a whole lot more energy. My mom told me not to take iron because she said it would make me constipated. She was WRONG! No issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE GREAT AS THEY ARE NOT CONSTIPATING
customer_reviews.text: IF YOU'RE ANEMIC, (WHICH I AM), THESE ARE GREAT AS THEY ARE NOT CONSTIPATING, WHICH ALOT OF IRON PILLS ARE. THEY DON'T UPSET YOUR STOMACH EITHER.
customer_reviews.author: SUE CORYELL

customer_reviews.title: Won't use any other brand
customer_reviews.text: I've taken iron supplements for iron deficiency anemia for a long time. I also have allergies and really HATED all the artificial colors, preservatives, fillers, etc., etc. that were in most of them. I was thrilled when I ran across these while searching through Amazon. No artificial colors, no Gluten, no preservatives - go to the page for the Nature's Bounty brand and read the back label. It's inexpensive, works very well, and does not have a lot of unnecessary additives in it. Geez, how much I wish more companies would do the same!
customer_reviews.author: Gmom

customer_reviews.title: Good for a sensitive stomach
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble tolerating iron and I find I can tolerate this brand. This brand has the green coating that seems to make such a big difference when it comes to stomach discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: QuantumTunnelRat

customer_reviews.title: No side-effects noticed
customer_reviews.text: I have to take iron supplements for my pregnancy. They are small and easy to swallow, and I have had no experience at all with an after taste. They also don't cause any upset stomach issues or constipation. I have been taking them for about 3 weeks now and all seems to be well. I have noticed I have more energy again, which was probably do to low iron because of my pregnancy, so these have been a great help. I will be getting more when I run out as these are a great price, and seem to be doing what needs to be done.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I’m becoming increasingly disappointed in nature’s bounty. The taste of these is terrible. I’ve used them for a month, and skipped a few days because they are so bad they make me sick sometimes. This comes after I got 2 spoiled bottles of vitamin D. Used them and trusted them for years, but not anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M. Rosselli

customer_reviews.title: Only natural ingredient Ferrous Sulfate I found
customer_reviews.text: My ND says she sees results with this form of iron getting levels back up more than Floradix and Vitanica. This is the only one I found *without* a bunch of gross ingredients like mineral oil, fd&c red and blue, talc, sodium lauryl sulphate, titanium dioxide... that was the one sold at Walgreens, Fred Meyer, CVS, Target etc.
customer_reviews.author: Boheme PDX

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't upset my stomach
customer_reviews.text: I tried a few different brands before this one for iron deficiency anemia, they all had the same thing in common, made my stomach hurt and gave me gas pain badly. There are no weird colors added or additional chemicals to this, I'm very sensitive and this is the only one I can take that has no digestive side effects. I'll subscribe to it.
customer_reviews.author: ColeMc3

customer_reviews.title: Dissolve FAST
customer_reviews.text: Dissolve as soon as they touch your tongue, nasty residue and BITTER taste. I thought they were the same kind I have gotten before, but they are not. They are off white and dissolve QUICKLY
customer_reviews.author: Beth H

customer_reviews.title: Helps to stabilize energy
customer_reviews.text: Being anemic and low in iron, I've struggled with having enough energy. This supplement is exactly that, a supplement to eating & living well. I dont get enough in my daily diet, so this helps me to get the amount I need. It doesnt make you feel jittery or perk you up, its just a subtle notice to not feeling so run down daily.
customer_reviews.author: CReg702

customer_reviews.title: Exhausted No More
customer_reviews.text: For years, Ive been absolutely exhausted no matter how muxh sleep I got. Id sleep for 12 hours wake up unreasonably tired, go to work and crash. Repeat. Ive been taking these for two weeks (after measuring 8.4 for my iron levels. The goal was 12.4.) now and I swear by them. Its 8 p.m. and I am wide awake. I feel great! I didnt give the pills 5 stars because I put one in my mouth before food to swallow independently and it tasted horrible! Anyhow if your iron is low and you find yourself to be tired all the time, I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Snow Capped Afro

customer_reviews.title: Will make you poop
customer_reviews.text: I’m anemic so I figured I’d try these out because they’re cheap. But spend the extra money for a better quality product. I tried them on an empty stomach (Recommended), after eating, and a few hours after eating and it made no difference, each time I was running to the bathroom for the next hour. Will be tossing the rest out.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Don't know yet if it's working
customer_reviews.text: I just started taking these a couple weeks ago and I have yet to have my iron labs done, my hemoglobin and RBC (red blood cells) did go up slightly but that probably was because for 2 months I was previously taking a sublingual iron supplement. I do eat a lot of vitamin c rich foods as you need to absorb the iron.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.  Not a bioavailable form of Iron
customer_reviews.text: I began taking this after my iron levels were deemed low in pregnancy. I have now been taking this for over 4 months (November-March) and just got my labs taken again - my Hemoglobin levels have not improved at all. I was at 11.1g/dL before and I am exactly 11.1g/dL after. (11.7-15.5 g/dL is my target.) I have ordered and will be trying a different Iron Supplement, Iron bisglycinate, as it is reportedly more bioavailable, i.e. easily absorbed and utilized by the body.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: New formulation.  AWFUL TASTE!!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these for years and would have rated it a "5". I can tend to be anemic and these kept my iron levels within acceptable ranges. However, my latest batch was a new formulation. They are no longer dark green (not a problem) and no longer have a coating (a huge problem). Without the coating, you really taste the iron which is AWFUL!! It makes my mouth taste metallic for many minutes after taking, no matter how much I try to wash my mouth out. I'm fairly frugal, but the rest of the bottle is going in the trash and I will look for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Grove City mom

customer_reviews.title: Works for me !
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking these since my miscarriage and it took about 4 months to be able to have energy to do things around the house . I was taking 2 but my doctor said to take 3 since my iron was lower then normal range . I take 3 a day , space them out thru the day and my blood results have shown within a month that my iron levels did rise a little but it's better then nothing . It does have a bad taste but the faster it goes down the less time u have to taste it and I do get a little constipated but during my period my body always flushes itself out .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Iron Pills
customer_reviews.text: These work great ! They give you great energy and make you feel like a brand new person !
customer_reviews.author: Kemi

customer_reviews.title: Does just fine
customer_reviews.text: I started taking iron pills to help combat tiredness and these did the trick, but I have found other brands I preferred over these. The Mg is smaller and the pill shape is not my preference (small, round).
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like crap
customer_reviews.text: It works as expected, but tastes foul. Might be a plus for those with small children to avoid overdose (very painful and deadly) when locking up alone may not be enough. Also, KEEP AWAY FROM CHILDREN.
customer_reviews.author: Kit Triforce

customer_reviews.title: first time
customer_reviews.text: I just recieve pills today,Some how I was so sleepy . Ferrous sulfate pills always makes me sleep.I look how many in bottle and brought for the price.Will get back to review when try at least a week or so.
customer_reviews.author: Meeka

customer_reviews.title: Fe is important
customer_reviews.text: Iron was low when I donated blood, took pills for 3 weeks before next donation. All was good.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. B

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Hated these. They start to dissolve before you swallow leaving a nasty taste in your mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Keysear

customer_reviews.title: Iron
customer_reviews.text: 😎 it's just iron how can you review iron I don't know seems to be working
customer_reviews.author: petep

customer_reviews.title: Iron still low
customer_reviews.text: Had my iron checked before and after these. I still wasn’t able to donate blood sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job.
customer_reviews.text: Helped control my anemia. Wish they were in bigger does however because your body only absorbs a percentage of it, so you'll probably get 10% of this pill. I take 1 when I wake up and 1 before I sleep and it's worked better for me. All in all it depends on how low your iron is.
customer_reviews.author: Fz.

customer_reviews.title: Good product but not for me..
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product but makes me feel nauseous after taking...There is no way, I can take this on an empty stomach if it makes me feel nauseated even if I had eaten...
customer_reviews.author: Joycelyn Cisco

customer_reviews.title: Buy One Get Two
customer_reviews.text: I thought that your description stated that this was two containers of tablets? That is what it states to me.
customer_reviews.author: john mayberry

customer_reviews.title: Very nauseated supplements
customer_reviews.text: Will Not recommend this iron supplements at all! Makes me feel nauseated and throw up every time I use it!
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The product was easy to order and was delivered on time as promised. And it is easy to reorder in the future.
customer_reviews.author: xamp10

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I take this with Vitamin C it makes it easier to digest on my sensitive stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Frosty

customer_reviews.title: I cannot take this.
customer_reviews.text: Its causing too much stomach pain. Dr suggested I take "SlowFE" iron which seems to be much more tolerable so far.
customer_reviews.author: ScullyRose

customer_reviews.title: Best form of Iron supplement I have found....
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great product, excellent results. Highly recommend this brand.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not coated leaves a terrible taste in your mouth when taking your daily dose

customer_reviews.title: Not coated, nasty taste
customer_reviews.text: These are not coated and they start dissolving immediately, leaving a nasty taste. Am ordering a different brand which is coated.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Iron deficiency so I was told to take 3 a day. Small easy to swallow.

customer_reviews.title: My iron's better, but swallow fast and have plenty to wash it down really far--horrid taste.
customer_reviews.text: Doc said I need iron. You must swallow these fast or you will have a horrid metal taste in your mouth.

customer_reviews.title: just okay
customer_reviews.text: not really noticing a difference but will continue to take until bottle is gone

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My wife took it during pregnancy, and helped her with iron deficiency.

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Second time ordered! Will continue ordering on Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Good Vitamin
customer_reviews.text: Good vitamin - using to supplement a prenatal gummy vitamin since those don't come with iron. These are extremely easy to swallow and have no bad taste. Also, other iron supplements I've tried give me terrible tasting burps, but these do not. I would recommend, and will order these again when I'm out.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been anemic for a while and had been passing out, these definitely saved me.

customer_reviews.text: It didn't help me at all with my iron levels. Moreover, it gives me stomach problems whenever I take it. I didn't like it.

customer_reviews.title: Overall good but minor nausea
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it doesn’t make me consitpated. However, I have to take it right before bed because about 30 minutes after you take it, you will experience some nausea. Nothing bad, but I try to fall asleep before it hits.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible taste
customer_reviews.text: The flavor was awful, but all vitamin and mineral supplements taste bad to me.

customer_reviews.text: It gives my body the amount of iron it needs!

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years for osteoporosis. I was a bit irritated when the "petite" changed sizes. It's doing its job, as my dexascan is always positive.

customer_reviews.title: Awful aftertaste. Not going to buy again!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I hate these! I take iron and have never had ones that had such a awful aftertaste. Omg it's so bad. I'm going to buy my older ones that are a little more expensive way worth it. Lol

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I got them for iron deficiency and was worried they'd make me sick at first. I can't say wether they worked or not but they didn't make me sick like other supplements can

customer_reviews.text: Tastes absolutely disgusting, couldn’t tolerate it and threw it out after gagging. Better off getting a slow release iron that you could actually swallow.

customer_reviews.text: Look like the ones I've been taking - seem OK.

customer_reviews.text: I like that I can buy on line a great product without going out at a great price.

customer_reviews.text: has a little iron taste if you let it dissolve a tiny bit in your mouth (no gel coating) but i am very sensitive, most people may not notice taste.

customer_reviews.text: I'm not happy with my purchase. The bottle seal is broken before i open it. I don't want to take a pill when im not sure if somebody already touched the pills. disgusting.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like these. They don't have any after taste or cause nausea like other iron tablets. Will be purchasing more👍

customer_reviews.text: I have to take iron daily, these are my go-to!

customer_reviews.text: They are iron tablets for sure. They do what you expect them to do. They're big pills, so some may need to cut them to swallow more easily.

customer_reviews.title: Just started taking these about 2 weeks ago. If ...
customer_reviews.text: Just started taking these about 2 weeks ago. If you take them after a meal there are no side effects.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i notice i have more energy and not as tired.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Great Pills, No Side Effects
customer_reviews.text: My doc requested I started taking iron to battle pregnancy anemia so I ordered these pills. I was worried that they'd make me sick or constipated (as many supplements can, especially iron) but thankfully these have not given me any symptoms! I pair the pill with vitamin c tablets or vitamin c rich foods to get the maximum absorption. After a couple of weeks of taking them, I felt a lot more energized so they definitely work!
customer_reviews.author: JessicaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: The taste is disgusting when the iron begins to melt and I gag
customer_reviews.text: Although this product appeared to match the iron pills I currently take, they are not red in color which means they are not coated and do not melt on your tongue. The taste is disgusting when the iron begins to melt and I gag. For this reason I wish to cancel the ongoing renewal of this order. I would be happy to continue if the iron pills were coated. Please let me know that this automatic renewal program has been cancelled. It is especially disappointing because the bottles match in every aspect.
customer_reviews.author: nancy c brown

customer_reviews.title: Weird After Taste
customer_reviews.text: I have experienced weird after taste with Fish Oil type supplements but not with Iron and not with another brand ordered via Amazon.. Guess I need to stick with what I know.. Have had really good luck with other Nature's Bounty Supplements
customer_reviews.author: F. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love the pills. I take them daily.My iron level was low but my iron has increased since ordering these pills.
customer_reviews.text: I love the pills. My iron levels were low but do to taking these pills daily, my iron level has increased.
customer_reviews.author: Brownskin

customer_reviews.title: They taste REALLY BAD. I recommend these instead
customer_reviews.text: They taste REALLY BAD. I recommend these instead. They don't have the awful taste, but they still dissolve early enough in the digestive tract for me to process (I have a condition that makes me unable to process medications that dissolve late in the digestive tract, such as anything with an enteric coating). The only reason I got a different brand this time was because these ones were out of stock at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W.

customer_reviews.title: Hope for hair loss.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I purchased it because I noticed my hair falling. After taking it few days the problem stopped. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JP44

customer_reviews.title: unnecessary food coloring and magnesium stearate
customer_reviews.text: THE PRODUCT HAS BLUE AND YELLOW NO6 LAKE, TITANIUM DIOXIDE, CROSPOVIDONE , MAGnESIUM STEARATE. JUST FYI. I just took it so i dont know what it does to the digestive system yet.
customer_reviews.author: MAJA

customer_reviews.title: Started to loose my hair!
customer_reviews.text: I read that too much iron could make you loose your hair, needless to say, I stopped taking this supplement for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: JLAMPDAZME

customer_reviews.title: Nausea
customer_reviews.text: I took the first one. I was so nauseated I had to lay down for about an hour. I threw them away. Yes, I had eaten - not a lot but I don't eat a lot so i'm never gonna be taking them on a hearty boy meal. If you only eat a banana or an apple or something for breakfast, that won't be enough for these not to make you sick.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Dion

customer_reviews.title: Id recommend something more potent
customer_reviews.text: From consistent blood tests I see an increase in iron but not as high as Id hoped... If you are pregnant, Id recommend something more potent. It works but depends what you are using it for. Im anemic in pregnancy. I do eat natural sources of iron, take supplement shakes, take a Dsily, and tske this and my iron is still lower than hoped.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN WILKES BOOTH

customer_reviews.title: The only iron I can safely take
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other brands, and they made me feel sick. In the beginning, taking this brand, I was very careful to take it with food and lots of water/drinks throughout the day. Then weeks later I found myself getting lax on drinking throughout the day but still no ill effects. It works well, my doctor says my irons levels were good the last time I went in for blood work, so I try to stock up to make sure I don't miss a dose of these.
customer_reviews.author: Masselyn

customer_reviews.title: a waste
customer_reviews.text: I got this in double pack. gee thanks its terrible. I'd give it no stars. I have taken Iron for 20+ years. NEVER have I ever vomited instantly time after time while taking it. (I take multiple pills at once. I had to figure out which one it was- never did I expect it to be something I've taken more than half my life!) I don't know what is wrong with these pills. My only guess is because they are NOT COATED. They are so disgusting, I cannot fathom why anyone would voluntarily take these or produce them.
customer_reviews.author: dbp

customer_reviews.title: Tastes so bad you won't take them!
customer_reviews.text: I take Iron, everyday, I don't have any issues with swallowing pills, large, small, coated un-coated. Never had an issue, till I got these. These have such a horrible after-taste you'll end up throwing them in the back of a drawer to die a slow death. I dont care how quick you think you can toss them back and gulp down water. They will leave your mouth tasting like youve been gargling with that handfull of dirty change you keep in your car. Heaven bless you if you happen to belch in the next hour after taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Kells

customer_reviews.title: Raise my iron levels!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I went to the doctor and was told I was anemic and need to raise my iron levels fast or get an blood transfusion(no bueno). I brought this and was completely satisfied. After the first night of purchase(took with dinner) I felt an difference. I'm no longer sluggish or cold as often. I also started taking an multi vitamin to help with iron absorption.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie N.

customer_reviews.title: Used to be better, they need to bring back coating
customer_reviews.text: When I first used it a year ago it worked great. It was the only one that wouldn’t upset my stomach. I originally gave it five stars at that time. I just started reusing it and I noticed that they now have no coating... Which is a really bad idea. I get an instant iron aftertaste no matter how fast I swallow the pill. And it’s wrecking havoc on my stomach like all the previous ones I’ve tried. Unfortunately I will not be using this again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for My Son
customer_reviews.text: My son takes these everyday and has a very sensitive stomach. He has been them almost a week now without any stomach issues and he has not complained about the taste either. Seems to be working very well so far.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE W.

customer_reviews.title: TASTES TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: These pills taste absolutely terrible. They have a metallic taste but it's worse than that and even makes me gag. I'm sure I have used this brand before but will not again. I have only taken a few and have already ordered a new bottle from another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Patti L.

customer_reviews.title: affordable anemia remedy
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty basic. It's a good dosage to keep my anemia in check, and was affordable here. That's all I'm looking for.
customer_reviews.author: responder

customer_reviews.title: they do the job but leave a bad taste in your mouth
customer_reviews.text: I ran out of the ones I normally get at the store and didn't have time to run by and pick up more so I ordered on Amazon but oh my goodness these taste gross and leave a bad taste in your mouth. ordered another brand (Feosol) no bad taste and smaller pills (easier to swallow)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Tanner

customer_reviews.title: These didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I normally took the Ferrol Sol ones in the little green bottle, black tabs with a beveled edge, An hour after taking these my heart felt funny, I think they are not timed release. I went back to the other brand a feel like a million bucks again.
customer_reviews.author: Duke McCracken

customer_reviews.title: i still feel like i need a bit more iron during my monthly ...
customer_reviews.text: i need it when i get my menstrual cycle. however, i probably try to find one that has a higher mg count. i still feel like i need a bit more iron during my monthly friend.
customer_reviews.author: Hello Kitty Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Great boost for iron levels!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying these supplements for a while now and they really work. My iron levels are spot on and my doctors are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Foster

product_meta.title: Nature's Bounty Iron 65 Mg.(325 mg Ferrous Sulfate), 100 Tablets
product_meta.description: Supports Red Blood Cell Production. 65 mg Fe (325 mg Ferrous Sulfate). Helps Maintain Energy Utilization. Iron is a necessary component of hemoglobin the oxygen carrier in the blood and promotes energy utilization. Iron also supports normal red blood cell production and is important for women's nutritional health.
feature_bullets: Iron is a necessary component of hemoglobin, the oxygen carrier in the blood*
Iron supports energy utilization and normal red blood cell production*
This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease

Ingredients: Dried Ferrous Sulfate 205 mg (equivalent to 325 mg Liquid Ferrous Sulfate which provides 65 mg elemental Iron per tablet), Vegetable Cellulose, Crospovidone. Contains <2% of: Maltodextrin, Silica, triacetin, Vegetable Magnesium Stearate

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
